The `Teams` dataset has \_\_\_ observations and \_\_\_ variables.

### Exercise 2

...

```{r}
library(magrittr)
mets <- Teams  |>
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN")
my_mets <- mets |>
  dplyr::filter(yearID %in% 2004:2012)
my_mets |>
  dplyr::select(yearID,G,W,L)
my_mets
```
